SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into book (boot_name, author_id, user_id, image_usl, press_id, create_time, update_time, status, type_id, describe) values (#{bootName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageUsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update book set boot_name = #{bootName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image_usl = #{imageUsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, press_id = #{pressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select isbn, boot_name, author_id, user_id, image_usl, press_id, create_time, update_time, status, type_id, describe from book where isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
